title: how to play rotating game queue in new client
body: anyone know? i can't find it...

replies.body:
yeh its not reachable on new client. RIP.

but hey, its a beta, mistakes and bugs to be expected
just saying but if it's only in the legacy client and OCE is defaulted to the new client... it might fail...

All regions are upgrading to beta not just OCE. This is why you can still switch to the legacy client at any time, because not quite all features are implemented in the new client yet, which is why it is still in beta.

It's not like it's difficult to switch back, and for most people, the Alpha client works for everything they want it to which is why now is the best time to open the beta, so they can test and implement the last few features before pushing it as the new complete client.
